nodes.text: The Encyclopedia Galactica was a reference book of some renown, published by TriPlanetary Press shortly before the Clone Wars. The entry for Neimoidians consisted of two words: See: Duros. This was a point of contention for the Duros, most notably Duros Chief Representative Officer Hoolidan Keggle.
The name Encyclopedia Galactica is quite likely a reference to the one that originally appeared in Asimov's Foundation series.[source?]
